backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, goals, planning data structures, and goal-related CRUD operations with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature fix, its related frontend file, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of various frontend files covering components, hooks, pages, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens and globals.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, goal library modal logic, layout, and theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AutoPlanner/Auto: UI for entering or selecting a goal template and duration, generating an auto-planned goal.
Review screen for editing and saving generated plans, orchestrating goal creation, tasks, milestones, and lock-in steps.
Controls the Auto Planner flow between goal input and plan review, storing and passing the generated plan to child components.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckIn.tsx: Fetches daily tasks and lets users mark them completed or missed with reasons, submitting a daily check‑in record.
frontend/src/components/DashboardHome.ts: Displays the main dashboard landing section with user greeting, locked‑in goals, and navigation to key app sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the app footer with credits, external link, and version information.
frontend/src/components/GoalDefinitionFl: Guides users through defining a new goal with description, timeframe, and motivation, then submits it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/GoalDetail.tsx: Shows detailed goal info with tabs for planning, daily tasks, weekly review, and allows goal deletion.
frontend/src/components/GoalLibraryModal: Displays a modal listing goal templates by category, allowing users to select and create goals from templates.
frontend/src/components/GoalsOverview.ts: Displays the user's goals, allows creating new goals or selecting from a library, and shows goal cards with status and timeframe.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with login handling, theme toggling, accent selection, and profile menu for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/lockedIn/CheckIn: Shows a 7‑day check‑in streak visualization with completion stats for a goal.
frontend/src/components/lockedIn/LockedI: Lists locked‑in goals with check‑in controls and navigation to the Auto Planner when empty.
frontend/src/components/PlanningPhase.ts: Guides users through adding milestones and tasks for a goal, then locking in the plan, with step-by-step input flows.
frontend/src/components/profile/emojiOpt: Exports a list of emoji options for profile customization.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal for creating or editing a user profile, including name and avatar emoji selection.
frontend/src/components/SettingsPanel.ts: Offers profile editing, account management, and sign-out options, including avatar changes and principal copying.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyPlan/Weekl: Shows weekly planning status for locked-in goals and offers navigation to the auto-planner when no plans exist.
Displays a goal card with metrics, milestones, tasks, and expandable detail view using data from multiple queries.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyReview.tsx: Provides a weekly review form where users mark completed tasks, write a summary, and submit a review.
frontend/src/contexts/DashboardNavigatio: Provides context for tracking and updating the active dashboard section.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccentPreset.ts: Manages theme accent presets and updates CSS variables based on user selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles, goals, and goal-related data via the actor API with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and a comprehensive set of CSS variables defining theming, color tokens, and utilities for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/autoPlanner/generatePla: Generates a structured goal plan with milestones, weekly tasks, and daily tasks based on timeframe and optional custom duration.
frontend/src/lib/goalTemplates.ts: Defines predefined goal templates containing description, timeframe, milestones, and tasks for various goal categories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard UI handling navigation between sections, sidebar/menu logic, and displaying goal and planning components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public landing page with branding, hero content, features, and login trigger using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Utilities converting backend nanosecond timestamps to Date and formatting them for display, including relative dates.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable messages from unknown error values with fallbacks for various error shapes.
frontend/src/utils/trackingMetrics.ts: Computes check‑in and goal metrics over recent days, including completion rates and counts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, issues, and feature requests for fixing the Auto Planner flow.
